PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DistributionPortPHistoryDuct
PropertySetDef.Definition: Fluid flow performance history attached to an instance of IfcPerformanceHistory assigned to IfcDistributionPort. This replaces the deprecated IfcFluidFlowProperties for performance values.

PropertyDef.Name: Temperature
PropertyDef.Definition: Temperature of the fluid. For air this value represents the dry bulb temperature.

PropertyDef.Name: WetBulbTemperature
PropertyDef.Definition: Wet bulb temperature of the fluid; only applicable if the fluid is air.

PropertyDef.Name: VolumetricFlowRate
PropertyDef.Definition: The volumetric flow rate of the fluid.

PropertyDef.Name: MassFlowRate
PropertyDef.Definition: The mass flow rate of the fluid.

PropertyDef.Name: FlowCondition
PropertyDef.Definition: Defines the flow condition as a percentage of the cross-sectional area.
